level.heading: SUMMARY OF EMBEDDED COST OF LONG TERM DEBT (ยง 15-203)

level.text: The following data shall be provided on long term debt (consolidated, partially consolidated or other) for the historical test year and the proposed test year, as applicable:
Type and coupon rate of issue;
Date issued;
Maturity date;
Original principal amount issued;
Face amount outstanding or to be outstanding;
Unamortized discount or premium, and description of amortization method;
Carrying value, net of outstanding amount unamortized discount or premium, and expenses;
Annualized interest cost;
Composite embedded cost rate;
Initial corporate and underwriting expenses;
Annualized amortization of corporate and underwriting expense;
Unamortized balance of corporate and underwriting expenses; and
Unamortized reacquisition costs;
[Repealed]
A schedule shall be provided showing the following:
The amounts of outstanding debt instruments which were reacquired by market purchase;
The amounts paid for the reacquired debt instruments;
The dates of reacquisition;
The gains or losses realized; and
The method of accounting for the reacquired debt and gains or losses resulting from reacquired debt.

Bell Atlantic – Washington, D.C., Inc., shall provide the data cited under ยง203.1 for its corporate entity, and on a Bell Atlantic consolidated basis. Consolidated data may be shown in summary form with reference to source documents containing that information.
